trans-unit.source: Specifies the details of a single typeface supported by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" />.
There are as many <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface> objects as there are typefaces supported by the system.
trans-unit.target: Существуют столько <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface> объектов имеется гарнитуры, поддерживаемый системой.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface" /> class.
Gets a collection of localized face names adjusted by the font differentiator.
An array of type <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> that represent the localized typeface names.
trans-unit.target: Массив объектов типа <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> , представляющие гарнитуры локализованные имена.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance from baseline to top of an English capital, relative to em size.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: Значение типа <see cref="T:System.Double" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of character metrics for a device font family typeface.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetricsDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: Значение типа <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetricsDictionary" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name or unique identifier for a device font family typeface.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the device font name.
trans-unit.target: Значение типа <see cref="T:System.String" /> , представляющую имя шрифта устройства.

trans-unit.source: Compares two font family typefaces for equality.
The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> value that represents the typeface to compare.
Compares two font family typefaces for equality.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="typeface" /> is not null and has the same properties as this typeface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface" /> value to compare.
Compares two font family typefaces for equality.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="typeface" /> is not null and has the same properties as this font family typeface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Serves as a hash function for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface" /> object.
The <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface.GetHashCode" /> method is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Int32" />.

The hash value is computed by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface.Style%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface.Weight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface.Stretch%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface> object.
trans-unit.target: Хэш-значение вычисляется с помощью <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface.Style%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface.Weight%2A>, и <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface.Stretch%2A> свойства <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface> объекта.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the designed stretch of the font family typeface.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.
trans-unit.target: Значение типа <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface.Stretch%2A> value describes the degree to which the font has been stretched compared to the font's normal aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface.Stretch%2A> Значение описывает степень, в которую растяжения шрифта по сравнению с обычными пропорциями шрифта.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the strikethrough value relative to the baseline.
The value is also relative to em size.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: Значение типа <see cref="T:System.Double" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface.StrikethroughPosition%2A> is usually positive in order to place the strikethrough above the baseline.
trans-unit.target: Значение <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface.StrikethroughPosition%2A> обычно положительно, чтобы поместить зачеркнутый над направляющей.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the thickness of the strikethrough relative to em size.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: Значение типа <see cref="T:System.Double" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the font family typeface design.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: Значение типа <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Describes the style of a font face, such as normal, italic, or oblique.
trans-unit.target: Описывает стиль шрифта, такие как обычный, курсив или наклонный.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of underline value relative to the baseline.
The value is also relative to em size.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: Значение типа <see cref="T:System.Double" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface.UnderlinePosition%2A> is usually negative in order to place the underline below the baseline.
trans-unit.target: Значение <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface.UnderlinePosition%2A> обычно отрицательное, чтобы подчеркивание находится ниже базовой линии.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the thickness of underline relative to em size.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: Значение типа <see cref="T:System.Double" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the designed weight of this font family typeface.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" />.
trans-unit.target: Значение типа <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface.Weight%2A> value describes the relative weight of a given font.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.FamilyTypeface.Weight%2A> Значение описывает относительный вес данного шрифта.

trans-unit.source: Weight differences are generally differentiated by an increased stroke or thickness associated with a given character in a font, as compared to a "normal" character from that same font.
trans-unit.target: Различия в плотности обычно отличаются тем, увеличенному контуру или толщине, связанным с заданным символом в шрифте, по сравнению с «обычным» символом из того же шрифта.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Western x-height relative to em size.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: Значение типа <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
